title: murugap-perumAn tirunamam pOl
sahitya:
murugap-perumAn pOl aruL purivAruNDO sharaNamenavE tannai sArum anaivOrkkum


anupallavi

  oru muraiyEnum tan tirunAmattaik-karudi urugi varum aDiyArkku urudiyAi uDanE


caraNam    pAril vAzhavE puriyum pOril poruLait-tEDi vArik-kuvikkum Aval mIri vEru karuttinri
kUru keTTup-pOghAmal kunrutOrum ninru tan sIraDit-tuNai tanaik-kOrip-paNivOrukku
